dcterms:creator: Shailja Shailja
Jiaxiang Jiang
B.S. Manjunath
dcterms:description: The time series dataset in CTC2020 consists of 3D time-lapse video sequences of fluorescent counterstained nuclei microscopy image of C.elegans developing embryo. Each voxel size is 0.09 × 0.09 × 1.0 in microns. Time points were collected once per minute for (5 − 6) hours. There are 2 videos in the training set and 2 videos in the challenge (testing) dataset.
dcterms:title: CTC2020

dcterms:creator: Katharina Löffler
Tim Scherr
dcterms:description: The dataset is used for evaluating cell tracking methods and provides a benchmark for segmentation and tracking performance.
dcterms:title: KIT-Sch-GE

dcterms:creator: Coleman Broaddus

dcterms:description: The dataset is utilized for cell tracking and segmentation tasks, providing a reference for evaluating tracking algorithms.
dcterms:title: MPI-GE
